component.name: ThemedRowList
component.script:
Sub Init()
scene = m.top.getScene() themeChangeNotifier = scene.findNode("themeChangeNotifier") themeChangeNotifier.observeField("title", "ThemeChanged")
End Sub
Sub ThemeChanged()
m.top.rowLabelColor = m.global.theme.textOnBackground m.top.focusBitmapBlendColor = m.global.theme.primary
End Sub
